content.rendered:
SATCOM Engineering

Space Systems & SATCOM Solutions

Empowering the Future of Space Communications

At Optimal Solutions Inc. (OSI GOV), we deliver next-generation space system integration and SATCOM engineering in support of the Department of Defense and United States Space Force (USSF). Through the development of mission-critical programs, we’re modernizing how the military plans, operates, and secures satellite communications worldwide.

Proven Performance in Satellite Communications Engineering

As a trusted partner supporting the Wideband Satellite Communications Operational Management System (WSOMS), OSI GOV plays a key role in enabling resilient, cloud-native satellite control systems. Our implementations for WSOMS, empowers mission operators to dynamically configure, restore, and optimize Wideband SATCOM networks in both benign and contested environments.

Why OSI GOV?

  • Mission-Aligned Experience
    Proven delivery across the DoD Integrated Enterprise Network, modernizing Wideband SATCOM operations at global scale.
  • Standards-Based Engineering
    Deep expertise in MIL-STD 188-164C and 188-165B integration for terminal/modem compatibility and compliance.
  • Field-Ready Deployments
    We design zero-footprint, out-of-band (OOB) architectures that integrate with deployed systems—no new hardware required.

Our Core SATCOM Engineering Capabilities

  • Radio Frequency (RF) Configuration Management
    Automated power control and modem configuration across terminal networks, supporting both routine operations and restoral activities.
  • Situational Awareness (SA)
    Real-time visibility into terminal/modem status, RF parameters, and interference mitigation to reduce downtime and manual reporting.
  • Spectrum Visualization & Capture (SVC)
    On-demand spectral diagnostics supporting interference detection and analysis at the terminal level.
  • Text Chat (TC)
    Secure operator-to-terminal communication pathways over both embedded and OOB channels for real-time coordination and troubleshooting.
  • Standards Development & Compliance
    We actively implement changes to key MIL-STDs—ensuring future-ready interoperability across evolving DoD architectures.

Case Highlight

On the Power Control Management System (PCMS) for the IEN, OSI GOV delivered a full-stack SATCOM engineering solution, including microservice design, RF control automation, MIL-STD interface development, and a phased IOC-to-FOC deployment strategy that minimized risk and ensured uninterrupted service.
